title: Master JavaScript Essentials for Backend Development | Part 1
mcqs: JavaScript me let, const, aur var ka main difference kya hai?

tasks: Hoisting ka example likho

mcqs: Node.js ko install karne ke steps kya hai?
File system module me synchronous aur asynchronous methods ka kya farak hai?
tasks: Node.js ka ek simple server setup karo
Ek script likho jo file read aur write kar sake.

title: NPM Basics & Advanced Features | Backend Development Part 3
mcqs: package.json file ka kya use hai?
npm global aur local package installation me kya antar hai?
tasks: Ek package.json file generate karo

title: Master Express.js, Routing & Middleware | Backend Development Part 4
mcqs: Express.js me middleware kya hota hai?

Ek API endpoint banao jo JSON data return kare.

title: Master EJS, Dynamic Routing & Project Setup | Backend Development Part 6
mcqs: EJS ka use kya hota hai?
Dynamic routing kaise implement kiya jata hai?
tasks: EJS file create aur render karo

title: Hands-on Practice: Revisiting Key Concepts | Backend Development Part 7
mcqs: Backend development ke key concepts kya hai?
Node.js aur Express.js kaise interact karte hai?
tasks: Ek mini project implement karo jo sab concepts use kare
Backend best practices follow karne wale endpoints banao.

title: From Theory to Practice: Real-World Applications | Backend Development Part 8
mcqs: Real-world applications me backend ka role kya hai?
RESTful APIs aur GraphQL me kya difference hai?
tasks: Ek RESTful API design karo
User authentication aur authorization implement karo.

title: Building the Edit Feature | Backend Development Part 9
mcqs: Edit feature backend me kaise implement hoti hai?
PATCH aur PUT request me kya difference hai?
tasks: Ek API endpoint banao jo data update kare
Frontend se backend tak edit feature integrate karo.

title: Update feature with EJS & Server-Side Rendering | MongoDB | Part 13 - Backend Development
mcqs: EJS me form submission kaise handle karte hain?
MongoDB me update operation ka syntax kya hota hai?

tasks: Ek EJS form create karo jo MongoDB database update kare

Token-based authentication me refresh tokens ka kya role hota hai?
tasks: Ek JWT token generate aur verify karne ka example likho

mcqs: MongoDB me referencing aur embedding me kya antar hai?
Populate method ka use kya hota hai?

mcqs: MongoDB me schema design kaise hota hai?
Mongoose me models ka kya role hota hai?

mcqs: CRUD operations ka full form kya hota hai?
MongoDB me document deletion ke kitne tareeke hain?
tasks: MongoDB me ek CRUD API develop karo jo Express.js use kare

mcqs: Multer ke sath folder structure kaise organize karni chahiye?

File validation aur security enhancements add karo.

mcqs: Upcoming projects aur features kaunse announce kiye gaye?
